name: Mini Pillow Talk Blush and Glow Beauty Highlighter Wand Set
about: What it is: A travel-sized duo to get the universally flattering Pillow Talk look, featuring a Matte Beauty Blush Wand and the award-winning Beauty Light Wand.Highlighted Ingredients: - Glow Gel Technology: Melts seamlessly into the skin and plays with the light..- Lumi Blur Technology: Contains light-reflecting pigments that create a pop of color and smooth finish...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also vegan...What Else You Need to Know: This limited-edition duo unlocks a dreamy Pillow Talk blush and glow. Charlotte Tilbury's Beauty Light Wand formula melts seamlessly onto the skin for a high gloss highlight that stays dewy all day, while Matte Beauty Blush Wand creates a beautifying pop of color and a smooth, soft-focus finish...This Set Contains:.- 1 x .16oz/ 5ml Mini Pillow Talk Beauty Light Wand in Pillow Talk (soft rose gold highlight).- 1 x .16oz/ 5ml Mini Pillow Talk Matte Beauty Blush Wand in Pillow Talk (matte nude-pink)
ingredients: -Glow Gel Technology: Melts seamlessly into the skin and plays with the light..-Lumi Blur Technology: Contains light reflecting pigments that create a pop of color and smooth finish...Pillow Talk Beauty Light Wand in Pillow Talk:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Hydrogenated Didecene, Isododecane, Mica, Glycerin, Propanediol, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Silica, Sodium Chloride, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Hydroxyacetophenone, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Lindera Strychnifolia Root Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491)]. ..Pillow Talk Matte Beauty Blush Wand in Pillow Talk:.Isododecane, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Mica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Pillow Talk Matte Beauty Blush Wand:.-Using the easy-to-use cushion applicator, apply onto the apples of your cheeks, avoiding the eye area..-After each application, blend up along the cheekbones toward the temples for a quick lift effect...Pillow Talk Beauty Light Wand:.-Apply using the cushion applicator, then blend up and along the cheekbones for a beautifying Pillow Talk glow.

reviews.review_title: Best product I have ever used!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I luv this product so much!  I love this so much more than the set of one  This set is way better, with money,and the product it’s self !! I would suggest buying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The liquid highlighter is one of the best I've tried, and the liquid blush colour is pretty, too. I had no problems with either formula irritating my skin or messing up my foundation. However, the amount of product you get is so minimal that it feels like a waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s such a cute colour!!! It takes a second to get the actual product at first but once you do it’s pretty easy to use plus a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So nice! Got it for Christmas for my best friend! She loved it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very satisfied with this combo . I loved it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is important to start off small and then build your blush. This lasts all day (with setting spray) and did not fade. It also has a smooth finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These look so pretty in photos, but on me they emphasized texture, went on patchy, and even if I could get them to spread evenly, did not last. ￼

reviews.review_text: I like the highlighter but so far I have found the blush pills

reviews.review_title: blush is good highlighter is okay

reviews.review_text: I love the blush, the consistency is amazing. The highlighter looks almost gone after 2 uses which i thought was strange

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty but it was so much darker than I thought it would be. I thought it would be a medium coral shade but it was a deep brick color. The highlight is meant for someone with a medium skin tone which     is workable for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this product set for Christmas and I loved it. It was definitely a bit pricy but the products are amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The highlighter is a 11/10! Super glowy. The blush on the other hand….. The blush is a dark shade and it is patchy, but can be fixed with a beauty blender instead of  blending it with a blush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't have any products, extremely disappointed. It's practically air and no products. It's unbelievable. Used it only once and didn't even use that much product but that was it. It's empty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this on sale, and it was 24 dollars, although I was a little disappointed. The size of these is very small and a little smaller than my pinky finger. I personally don't think it was worth the money, but nice to try them out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: most of my makeup consists of charlotte tilbury so i was expecting this to be just as good as all their other products but it was a huge let down. the blush is a lot darker then i thought it would be and its patchy and fades quickly. the highlight is just not pigmented and poor quality as well. feels like a really cheap product, save your money!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: very cute colors and i love the highlighter so so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for one use and now nothing product come out.

reviews.review_text: I like the highlighter, the blush doesn’t show up much on darker skin and it wear off after a while. I like the lock feature.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Patchy and not what I was expecting. Maybe the full sizes are better quality, but I couldn’t get product out hardly. And then I applied it, it was really patchy and not cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This actually is so beautiful on my skin, and wasn’t too pricey since it came in a gift set, however it has a screw that you can use to keep the product from coming out and it is confusing sometimes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its so pretty and perfect size!! Get it before its gone!

reviews.review_title: The applicator either puts out too much product or
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The applicator either puts out too much product or not enough product. Once you get to the point the tube won't squeeze any longer there is still a lot of product left, I had to cut the tube open and dip with a brush to get the remainder out.  For the price, I think there are other products out there that work just as well and are less messy and trouble.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Can't believe I've been sleeping on these, they're amazing. Great staying power and beautiful colors. Great set to try. Now I want more of these. Can't wait to try more colors. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cheap quality in pretty packaging. Blush doesn't stay, vanishes in a few hours- and is patchy. The highlighter is chunky, too golden, and it spreads. Spend on Pixi or rare beauty instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I personally love this product! It's Amazing. Kinda tiny for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the size of these are perfect for those that want to try out her wands. formula is really great too.
